description:
New-ID 55
      
      This data set presents a classification of African closed moist tropical
      forest for Benin.
      
      The Africa Closed Moist Tropical Forest, Benin Dataset
      
      Files: BENVEG.E00    code: 108001-001
      
      Vector Member
      The file is in Arc/Info Export format and should be imported with
      the Arc/Info command Import cover In-Filename Out-Filename.  REMARK:
      The export files include annotation. however it is not possible to
      import the files with it. We had to edit in the export file (E00) just
      before the annotation the TXT command had to be changed in TX8. The
      annotations are then lost but the file can import without problems.
      The Africa Closed Moist Tropical Forest dataset is a compilation of
      national maps into comparable units by the World Conservation and
      Monitoring Centre (WCMC) in Great-Britain.  The maps were taken for
      each country for Africa from national maps and legend units were
      grouped to come upto 13 classes, describing forest types.
      Contact:  UNEP/GRID-Nairobi, P O Box 30522 Nairobi, Kenya
      
      In total 13 classes are compiled
      10  = Water bodies                    130 = Degradated Rain Forest
      111 = Mangroves                                 500 = Dry Forest
      112 = Degradated Mangroves              510 = Pine Forest
      113 = Inland Swamp Forest
      114 = Degradated inland Samp Forest   900 = Non Forest
      121 = Montane Rain  Forest                   999 = No Data
      122 = Lowland Rain Forest
      123 = Sun Montande Rian Forest
      In almost all coverages water bodies are labelled as 0
      
      References:
      WCMC Biodiversity Map Library - Closed Moist Tropical Forests and
      Managed Areas Data - February 1992 Paivinen and Ron Witt. The
      Methodology Devt. Project for Tropical Forest Cover Assessment in West
      Africa.
      
      Source:       Several National maps
      Publication Date: vary
      Projection:      Mercator, mentioned when different
      Related Datasets:     White vegetation map
      Keywords : WCMC, forests, national parks, hunting zones
      
      The Legend is in all coverages under ITEM "VEGN"
      AREA       = gives the rea of the polygon in the map units
      PERIMETER  = gives the perimeter of the polygon in map units
      XXXVEG#   and XXXVEG-ID   = internal Arc/Info number
      VEGN       = The Forest classification as explained above
      VEGETATION = Gives the legend name corresponding to the VEGN item (not all
      Tropical Moist Forest coverages have this)
title: WCMC Closed Moist Tropical Forest, Benin (Classification of Forest Types)
